item.title: Issue #15 - First interview!
item.description: new design / CCG & profit share / our first interview We fight with cards Issue #15 / July 28, 2017 // View in your browser The new site is up! To kick things off, I published my first interview: I talked Card City Nights with Joel from Ludosity. Check it out!
